text: Sophia Bush is a fan of the Hot Dudes Reading Instagram account. The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon / YouTube Sophia Bush rides the New York subway when she's in the city. During an appearance on NBC's ` ` The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon'' Wednesday, the ` ` Incredibles 2'' star said she kept seeing hot guys reading on the subway and was overwhelmed. ` ` My best friend and I are book nerds and both deeply single for so long that every day this week, we've been like,'Why are there so many hot guys on the subway reading?'''she said. ` ` Yesterday, I'm looking at this guy who is so beautiful and he's reading Zadie Smith, and I'm like,'Are you
